body: Hello there everyone. I would like to let everyone know that I will be going to my relative's house (five hour drive.) for the weekend. After the weekend, My internet is going to be cut off because we have a painter at our house and we have to take everything out so he can paint. After I unplug everything my internet would be gone. My internet will back after a week so I will be back playing Avicus then. I will also be playing Avicus today. Have a good weekend and a good week. Bai Bai.

title: I'll be back! :-).

replies.body:
Aww, that stinks ):
I've had an experience where I had no internet for about a week about 2 weeks ago, so I just went swimming a lot :3
I hope you find something fun to do while the internet is still out! Bye!
